For a newcommer to derpibooru you sure do fit in.




Random question: if you had to pick a anime movie to try to and get someone that is massively anti-anime to try other anime films and shows a shot what would you pick?  It has to be family friendly and it can't be a complex plot movie.  The reason why I ask is that I have one chance to get someone that absolutely hates anime without ever having watched a single one to try to get them to try other shows and such.  It has to be a single movie and if you don't get them interested then you've blown it forever.
